Statements.statement: I was about to offer you four pills today, but I took one of them to cure my 'lil girl.
I was about to offer you four pills today, but one of them was a candy and I was hungry.
Please, help yourself! It's not like you'll be around for a long time right?
Hey Claudine? Yes, it is for a transplant! What organ? I don't know, what'ya got?
I should consider making loyalty cards.
You know I am not a real doctor, right?
Kidneys are a myth, that's why they are so expensive.
Oh dear lord, you actually survived?!
You should quit smocking. What do you mean you don't smoke? Look at your lungs!
Oh blimey are you all right? You look terrible. HA! April's fool. You look like the Great Reaper crushed by a truck.
Do you want some soup? Sure? Because there is no way you will be able to eat something solid again.
No, I won't shake your hand. It looks like it'll fall off in any minutes.
Funny, you are the first person I met with blue blood.
Michele? Can you call the surgeon? This one looks like he is going to die in the minute. By the way, patient, how well is your bowel?
Do you know the difference between a dinausorus and you ? None, you're both going extinct at an alarming rate.
Of course I believe in God. I am surprised you don't, after all, you shouldn't even be breathing right now.
